SEARCH
Module com.example.gui_programming
Package banking_gui

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
banking_gui.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
This class represents a database of various banking accounts. It includes operations to manipulate and retrieve account data.
Author:
Altay Ozkan

  • Field Details

    • accounts

      private Account[] accounts

    • numAcct

      private int numAcct

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountDatabase

      public AccountDatabase()
      Default constructor initializes the account database with a default initial capacity.

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Finds the index of a specific account in the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to find.
      Returns:
      The index of the account if found, otherwise returns Constants.NOT_FOUND.

    • findExact

      private int findExact(Account account)
      Finds the index of a specific account in the database based on the account holder's details and exact account type.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to find based on exact details.
      Returns:
      The index of the account if found, otherwise returns Constants.NOT_FOUND.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the size of the accounts array to accommodate more accounts.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Checks if the database contains a specific account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to check.
      Returns:
      true if the account exists, false otherwise.

    • getAccount

      public Account getAccount(Account account)
      Retrieves the account details from the database based on the account holder's first name, last name, and date of birth.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to find based on holder's details.
      Returns:
      The account if found, otherwise returns null.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Adds a new account to the database. If the database is full, it will expand.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the account was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Removes a specific account from the database.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the account was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Processes a withdrawal operation on a specific account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account from which to withdraw. The balance of this account object represents the amount to be withdrawn.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      Processes a deposit operation on a specific account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account in which to deposit. The balance of this account object represents the amount to be deposited.

    • sortAccounts

      private void sortAccounts()
      Sorts the accounts in the database based on their type and profile.

    • printSorted

      public void printSorted(javafx.scene.control.TextArea outputArea)
      Prints the sorted list of accounts to the console.

    • printFeesAndInterests

      public void printFeesAndInterests(javafx.scene.control.TextArea outputArea)
      Prints detailed account information including fees and monthly interests.

    • printUpdatedBalances

      public void printUpdatedBalances(javafx.scene.control.TextArea outputArea)
      Prints the accounts after applying the monthly fees and interests to their balances.
